correctness.description: The accuracy of the final answer given by the agent.

reasoning_traceability.description: The agent's ability to provide a trace of its reasoning process that led to the answer.

completeness_of_steps.description: The extent to which all necessary steps to answer the question have been completed by the agent.

data_contamination_avoidance.description: Ensuring the answer is not contaminated with plagiarized or straightforwardly copied content from the internet.

execution_of_plan.description: How effectively the agent executed the proposed plan to find the solution.

resourcefulness.description: The agent's ability to find alternative solutions or paths when encountering obstacles.

communication_clarity.description: The clarity of communication from the agent when providing the answer or explaining the solution.
